identify_subjects.prompt: Identify the presence of the following subjects: LARGE PROJECTS, PUBLIC SAFETY, IMPACT ON CITIZENS, CHILDREN, DRUG CARTEL. Remember, a LARGE PROJECT refers to any development or construction endeavor that significantly impacts the local infrastructure, economy, or environment. PUBLIC SAFETY concerns any situation or event that could pose a risk to the health, safety, or well-being of the public. IMPACT ON CITIZENS covers any changes to the daily lives of citizens, including but not limited to disruptions, benefits, or changes in access to services. The CHILDREN subject can only be true if it directly involves children in the documents, meaning child workers. For DRUG CARTEL to be an identified category, there has to be direct involvement with drug cartels. Return the identified subjects formatted as a python list, with all capital letters.
